summary: Three years have passed since Elling moved to town together with Kjell Bjarne, his roommate from the institution at Brøynes. Elling now lives on his own in the apartment. Kjell Bjarne has ... See full summary »
cast: Per Christian Ellefsen|Sven Nordin|Marian Saastad Ottesen|Marit Pia Jacobsen|Kjersti Holmen|Per Christensen|Mari Sarnes Jardim|Nasrullah Qureshi|Stine Mari Björge|Gustav-Adolf Hegh|Rune Temte|Erland Vetleseter
title: Elsk meg i morgen
